title: E-Commerce Website
short: A modern e-commerce platform with shopping cart functionality and secure payment integration.
long: This comprehensive e-commerce website was built using React and Node.js, featuring a responsive design, user authentication, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing with Stripe. The project includes an admin dashboard for inventory management, order tracking, and customer analytics. I implemented advanced features like product search, filtering, wishlist functionality, and email notifications for order confirmations.
challenges: Implementing secure payment processing with Stripe
Optimizing database queries for product search
Creating responsive design for mobile shopping experience
solutions: Used Stripe's secure payment APIs with webhook validation
Implemented MongoDB indexing and aggregation pipelines
Applied mobile-first design principles with Tailwind CSS

title: Task Management App
short: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.
long: A full-featured task management application built with Next.js and Firebase, designed for team collaboration. Features include real-time task updates, drag-and-drop functionality, team invitations, progress tracking, and deadline notifications. The app supports multiple project boards, task assignments, and includes a comprehensive dashboard with analytics and reporting features.
challenges: Implementing real-time synchronization across team members
Managing complex state for multiple project boards
solutions: Used Firebase Firestore's real-time listeners for instant updates
Integrated React Beautiful DnD with optimistic UI updates
Implemented Zustand for efficient state management

title: Weather Forecast App
short: A responsive weather application with location-based forecasts and beautiful weather animations.
long: A modern weather application built with React and OpenWeatherMap API, featuring location-based weather forecasts, 7-day weather predictions, and beautiful animated weather icons. The app includes geolocation support, weather alerts, and the ability to save favorite locations. The interface adapts to current weather conditions with dynamic backgrounds and smooth animations.
